title: FPS drop?
body: Ever since 2 patches ago my second PC hasn't been able to run league properly? It has all its drivers updated and just updated league tried to play a game and it sits at 4 FPS. it used to run league around 60-80 fps before this. what changed?

replies.body:
Hey RQG Genji,

Have you already tried the solutions in the [**Low Frame Rate (FPS) Troubleshooting**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting) Riot Games Support article?
